metadata.title: Infinex — AI Transformation & Augmented Engineering
metadata.description: Infinex is your AI transformation partner. Strategy, augmented engineering, measurable results. Go from AI-absent to AI-native.

hero.title: Infinite growth.
hero.subtitle: Your AI transformation partner.
hero.description: We help ambitious companies go from AI-absent to AI-native. Clear strategy, fast execution, measurable results.

strategy.title: AI Strategy
strategy.description: Process audit, bottleneck identification, custom AI roadmap. No useless slides — a concrete action plan.

transformation.title: AI Transformation
transformation.description: AI solution implementation, team training, change management. We execute, you measure the ROI.

engineering.title: AI Engineering
engineering.description: Outcome-based engineering squads augmented by AI. You pay for features delivered, not hours spent.

whyNow.title: Why now?
whyNow.paragraph1: The cost of intelligence is trending toward zero. What about you?
whyNow.paragraph2: Every month without an AI strategy is a competitive advantage you're handing to your rivals. AI is not optional. It's a strategic imperative.
whyNow.paragraph3: You have a choice. Disrupt yourself. Or be disrupted by others.
whyNow.highlight: AI is not scary. Ignoring it is.

items.quote: Infinex transformed the way we work in 3 months. 4x ROI on the first project.
items.author: CTO

items.quote: No jargon, no endless slides. Just concrete, measurable results.
items.author: CEO

items.quote: Infinex's AI engineering team delivers in 2 weeks what used to take us 2 months.
items.author: VP Engineering

items.question: How is Infinex different from a traditional consulting firm?
items.answer: We don't make slides, we execute. We measure ROI, not hours. No 200-page decks. No 6-month diagnostics. We identify opportunities, implement, and measure.

items.question: What does 'AI transformation' mean?
items.answer: Identify your bottlenecks, build tailored AI solutions, train your teams, measure results. Rinse and repeat. The goal: make you AI-native, not AI-dependent.

items.question: How does pricing work?
items.answer: Engineering: monthly subscription based on results. Transformation: custom partnership adapted to your context. Contact us to discuss.

items.question: What type of companies do you work with?
items.answer: Mature companies (>$5M revenue) motivated to become AI-native but lacking the internal resources or expertise to do it alone.

items.question: How does AI engineering work?
items.answer: Outcome-based engineering squads, augmented by AI. You pay for features delivered, not hours. We integrate AI into every stage of development to deliver faster and better.

finalCta.title: Stay on the right side of history.
finalCta.subtitle: We don't care about today. We care about the next decade.

advantages.title: Why not a traditional dev shop?

about.title: About
about.metaDescription: Discover the vision, mission and values of Infinex — your AI transformation partner.

vision.title: Our vision
vision.description: A world where every company fully leverages AI's potential. Not as a gimmick, but as a fundamental strategic advantage.

mission.title: Our mission
mission.description: Accelerate AI transformation for ambitious companies with a results-oriented, fast, no-BS consulting approach.

items.title: Execution > theory
items.description: We don't make slides, we deliver results. Every action must have measurable impact.

items.title: Radical transparency
items.description: No jargon, no empty promises. We tell you what works, what doesn't, and why.

items.title: Speed of iteration
items.description: The market doesn't wait. We test fast, learn fast, adapt fast.

items.title: Long-term partnership
items.description: We don't sell projects. We build partnerships that transform your company sustainably.

team.title: The team
team.description: A team of AI, engineering and strategy experts, united by one obsession: making you AI-native.

getStarted.title: Get Started
getStarted.metaDescription: Contact Infinex to start your AI transformation. Quick contact form, response within 24h.
getStarted.heading: Ready to take action?
getStarted.subtitle: Fill out the form below. We'll get back to you within 24 hours.

form.name: Full name
